requirements.summary: Improve the Home page with job-portal blue-slate/teal theme, dynamic platform stats from backend, and at least 6 featured job categories with icons
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section uses the established blue-slate/teal palette, not farm-market greens or ambers.
Live jobs and registered users counts are pulled from the backend via React Query.
At least 6 job categories are displayed with icons in the categories section.

file_operations.description: Update the hero section to use the blue-slate and teal color theme from the portal palette. Fetch platform stats (active jobs count, registered users count) from the backend using the getSystemReport query hook and display them dynamically. requirements.summary: Add an 'Applied Jobs' count badge to the Job Seeker Dashboard Applications tab derived from existing applications data
acceptanceCriteria: The Applications tab in the Job Seeker Dashboard displays a numeric badge showing the total application count.
The badge updates without a page reload when a new application is submitted.

file_operations.description: Add a count badge to the Applications tab label in the tab bar. Derive the count from the applications data loaded by the useGetMyJobApplications hook. The badge should display the length of the applications array and update reactively when the query data changes.

requirements.summary: Add bulk status update action to Employer Dashboard applicant list allowing selection and batch status updates via checkboxes
acceptanceCriteria: Employer can select one or more applicants using checkboxes on the applicant list.
A bulk action dropdown or button appears when at least one applicant is selected.
Confirming a bulk status update calls the backend update for each selected applicant and refreshes the list.

file_operations.description: In the Applicants tab, add checkboxes to each applicant row for selection. Track selected applicant IDs in component state. When at least one applicant is selected, display a bulk action dropdown or button offering status options (Shortlisted, Rejected, etc.). On confirmation, call the updateApplicationsStatus backend method (passing an array of selected application IDs and the new status) using a mutation hook, then refresh the applicants query data.

requirements.summary: Fix Admin Panel system reports to display accurate summary cards with live counts fetched from backend getSystemReport
acceptanceCriteria: System reports cards show real-time counts sourced from backend queries.
Each card (Users by Role, Total Jobs, Total Applications, Total Hires) has a labeled icon and numeric value.
Data refreshes when the Admin Panel is opened.

file_operations.description: In the System Reports tab, use the useGetSystemReport query hook to fetch live counts from the backend. Display summary cards for: total users by role (Job Seeker, Employer, Admin), total active job listings, total applications, and total hired applications. Each card should have an icon, label, and the numeric value from the SystemReport data. Ensure the query refetches when the Admin Panel is opened or the tab is selected.
